name: Chicken Vesuvio
steps: 2 large russet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
1 3-4 pound chicken, cut into 8 pieces (or 3 pound chicken legs)

name: Chicken Paprikash
steps: 640 grams chicken - drumsticks and thighs ( 3 whole chicken legs cut apart)
1 tablespoon butter – cultured unsalted (or olive oil)
240 grams onion sliced thin (1 large onion)
70 grams Anaheim pepper chopped (1 large pepper)

name: Baked Chicken
steps: 6 bone-in chicken breast halves, or 6 chicken thighs and wings, skin-on

name: Catalan Chicken
steps: 3 lemons, peeled, rinds thinly sliced and reserved
½ cup Banyuls or another fortified dessert wine

name: Chicken Liver Pâté
steps: 2 tbsp. rendered chicken fat or unsalted butter
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

name: Kreplach (Chicken Dumplings)
steps: 1 cup (about ½ pound) raw, boneless chicken meat (preferably from 3 boneless chicken thighs), roughly chopped
⅔ cup (about ¼ pound) chicken skin and fat (reserved from the 3 chicken thighs)
¼ cup finely chopped chives, plus extra for serving
¾ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
8 cups store-bought or homemade chicken broth

name: Chicken cacciatore
steps: 6 chicken breasts, or chicken thighs, bones removed

name: Roast Chicken
steps: -- Salt and fresh-ground pepper, to taste
3 to 4 sprigs thyme, or other herbs

name: Southwestern Chicken Soup
steps: 3 cups cooked chicken pieces (1 small deli-counter rotisserie chicken or leftovers)

name: Chicken Soup
steps: 2 stalks celery, including leafy tops, cut into 3-inch pieces
Salt to rub inside the chicken
1 large whole onion, unpeeled (find one with a firm, golden-brown peel)
1 bunch dill, cleaned and tied with a string

name: Braised Chicken Gumbo
steps: 1 medium red or green bell pepper, diced
2 cups shredded chicken from Wine & Tomato Braised Chicken (recipe follows)
2 cups sauce from Wine & Tomato Braised Chicken
1 cup sliced okra, fresh or frozen (thawed)
¾ cup instant brown rice (see Tip)

name: Roast Chicken With Chicken Livers
steps: 1/4 pound chicken livers, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces

name: Smothered Chicken
steps: 2 (5-ounce) packets chicken fry coating (recommended: Dixie Fry)
2 tablespoons salt-free chicken seasoning, divided (recommended: McCormick Grill Mates)
2 (12-ounce) jars roasted chicken gravy (recommended: Franco American)

name: Chicken Poofs
steps: 2 containers (8 rolls in each) reduced-fat crescent rolls

name: Chicken Piccata
steps: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter cut into small pieces

name: Ultimate Roast Chicken
steps: 1 chicken, 3* to 4 1/2 lbs., lumps of fat and tail removed, rinsed and patted very dry
Fine sea salt (1 1/2 tsp. for a 3- to 3 3/4-lb. chicken or 2 tsp. for a 4- to 4 1/2-lb. chicken)
Pepper (3/4 tsp. for a smaller chicken or 1 tsp. for a larger one)
About 1 tbsp. olive oil (for plain or French Herb chicken)

name: Tomato Gravy
steps: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Tomato And Avocado Sandwich
steps: 3 slices ripe tomato (about ½ a medium-sized tomato)

name: Fresh tomato broth
steps: 1 x 2kg whole free-range chicken , fat trimmed off

name: Tomato Matzo Balls
steps: 1/2-3/4 cup matzo ball mix (usually 1-1 1/2 bags out of a box)

name: Tomato Stack
steps: ½ whole wheat English muffin, toasted
2 thin red and/or yellow tomato slices
1 ounce fresh mozzarella, cut into 4 slices
1 grape tomato or cherry tomato, halved (optional)

name: Tomato Sauce
steps: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Tomato Chips
steps: 1 medium firm tomato sliced 1/16 inch thick

name: Tomato Flat Bread
steps: 2 c soaked wheat berries (oat groats can be substituted)

name: Mixed Tomato Salad With Green Tomato Vinaigrette
steps: Sea salt and freshly ground pepper
2 pounds assorted heirloom tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 pound assorted small tomatoes, larger tomatoes cut in half
2 tablespoons minced fresh chiles, such as jalapeño

name: Eggplant-Tomato Tartare
steps: 1 medium eggplant (any variety), chopped to about 1/2-inch squares
1 large tomato or several cherry or grape tomatoes, chopped to 1/2-inch pieces

name: Triple Tomato Eggs
steps: 1/4 cup minced bell peppers (any color OK; a mix is good)
1 cup diced fresh or canned tomatoes
Sea salt, freshly ground black peppercorns

name: Cherry Tomato Lollipops
steps: 2 oz. jalapeño or tomato-and-olive Jack cheese

name: Tomato Balsamic Dipper
steps: 2 vine-ripe tomatoes, seeded and coarsely chopped
Salt and black pepper, to taste

name: Broccoli with Parmesan
steps: 1 1/2 pounds broccoli Broccoli Regular 1 lb for $1.29 thru 11/25

name: Parmesan Broccoli
steps: 50.0g parmesan , grated, plus extra to serve

name: Broccoli And Broccoli Rabe With Roasted Red Peppers
steps: 4 pounds broccoli, stems trimmed, crowns cut into small florets (about 13 cups florets)
2 1/2 pounds broccoli rabe (about 3 large bunches), tough stems trimmed, tops and leaves coarsely chopped

name: Broccoli Almondine
steps: 1 1/2 pounds broccoli, stems peeled, then head cut into 2-inch-wide spears

name: Sautéed Chinese Broccoli
steps: 1 lb. Chinese broccoli or broccoli rabe
2 fresno chiles, halved, seeded, and finely chopped

name: Jade Broccoli With Pecans
steps: 2 1/2 cups peeled and shredded broccoli stalks (from 3 pounds broccoli)

name: Christmas Broccoli: Broccoli Soffriti
steps: 3 pounds fresh broccoli, with leaves, or broccoli rabe
10 salted anchovies, cleaned, filleted and roughly chopped

name: Broccoli Rabe with Garlic
steps: 3 pounds broccoli rabe or 7 cups broccoli florets

name: Creamy Broccoli Soup
steps: 2 x medium sized potatoes, peeled and chopped into cubes
175 g broccoli, cut into small pieces
salt and freshly ground white pepper
50 g broccoli, extra for decoration, chopped into small pieces and par boiled

name: Chinese Broccoli
steps: 1 to 1 1/2 pounds Chinese broccoli (gai lan) or regular broccoli (see notes)

name: Charred Lemon Broccoli
steps: 1 head broccoli, cut into florets (or 12 oz broccoli florets)

name: Pastitsio Pastetseo Potato Patato recipes
steps: 1/3 pound elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
1 large eggplant, peeled, sliced 1/4″ thick, lightly salted, and sauteed in olive oil until tender and brown
1 large eggplant, peeled, sliced 1/4″ thick, lightly salted, and sauteed in olive oil until tender and brown

name: Beer Vinegar
steps: 1/2 gallon good, wheaty or malty beer

name: Beer Profiteroles with Chocolate-Beer Sauce
steps: 1 cup (8 ounces) chocolate stout, or other dark beer

name: Beer Batter
steps: 1 to 1½ cups beer, any kind; the darker the color the more beer flavor will come through
Kosher salt and freshly milled black pepper

name: Beer Bread recipes
steps: 12 ounces lager (or beer of your choice)
2 tablespoons butter, melted and slightly cooled

name: Ginger beer chicken & ribs
steps: 8 pieces of chicken (we used thighs and drumsticks), bone in and skin on
1kg spare rib , cut between the bones, if a whole rack
juice 2 limes , plus extra wedges to serve

name: Soft Beer Pretzels with Beer Mustard
steps: 1 (1/4 oz) pkge active dry yeast or 2¼ tsp (1/4 oz)
1tb dark muscovado sugar (or other dark brown sugar)

name: Sour Beer Sorbet
steps: 1 pound fresh stone fruit (cherries, peaches, plums, apricots, etc.)

name: Beer Brat Soup
steps: 1 (12 ounce) can light beer or non-alcoholic beer
4½-inch-thick slices whole-grain baguette-style French bread, toasted

name: Beer-Can Chicken
steps: 2 whole dried chiles, such as chipotle or New Mexico

name: Double Root Beer Float
steps: 1 scoop of root beer ice cream

name: Light Beer Bread
steps: 1 can (12 ounces) light beer, room temperature

name: Flour Buttercream Recipe
steps: 1 cup (2 sticks) unsalted butter, cubed and softened at room temperature

name: Chickpea-Flour Crêpe
steps: 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, plus 3 tbsp.

name: Plain flour bread
steps: 500g plain white flour or wholemeal flour, plus extra
handful of oats or seeds, optional

name: Homemade Flour Tortillas
steps: 1/3 cup hot water, or as necessary

name: Chestnut Flour Crepes
steps: 1 1/2 cups chestnut flour Gold Medal Flour All-Purpose $1.99 thru 11/25
3 large eggs, lightly beaten Eggs Large White 2 for $3.00 thru 11/25
Chestnut Espresso Caramel-Swirl Ice Cream, for serving

name: Flour Tortillas
steps: 6 tbsp vegetable shortening (preferably a non-hydrogenated type, such as Spectrum)

name: Flour Tortillas
steps: 2¾ cups all-purpose flour, divided, plus a little extra for rolling out the tortillas
¾ cup very warm tap water

name: Homemade Flour Tortillas recipes
steps: 1 3/4 cup (9 ounces) all-purpose flour, plus more for kneading

name: Flour Tortillas
steps: 9 ounces all-purpose flour, plus 1/4 cup for kneading and rolling

name: Buttermilk Bacon Fat Flour Tortillas Recipe
Chocolate Banana Bread With Teff Flour
steps: 1 cup gluten-free flour of your choice

name: Toasted-Flour Sablés
steps: 3 hard-boiled egg yolks, pressed through a fine-mesh sieve
3/4 cup (1 1/2 sticks) unsalted butter, room temperature

name: Coconut Flour Pancakes
steps: 1 ¼ cups eggs (either 6 chicken eggs or 25 quail eggs, which is what ariane used.)
1/3 cup milk (she used coconut, but any kind of milk works.)

name: The Crispy Egg
steps: 1 glug olive oil or cooking fat of your choice
Salt, pepper, herbs, spices or hot sauce, or all of the above

name: Egg Noodle
steps: 1 cup semolina flour (plus extra for the board)
2 eggs, plus 4 egg yolks, beaten together

name: Egg Sandwich
steps: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper

name: Egg Nests recipes
steps: 1/8 teaspoon Kosher salt (a pinch of salt per egg)

name: Mexican egg roll
steps: a little rapeseed oil for frying

name: Egg-In-A-Hole
steps: 1 slice Your Favorite Kind Of Bread

name: Sunny Egg Ravioli
steps: fresh herbs, mixed like basil, parsley,thyme
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Egg Nog
steps: ½ tsp. nutmeg , plus more to taste

name: Goose Egg Omelette
steps: 50 grams salt and freshly ground white pepper
